document.full_text: for sherri and john stern, who have lived together on the red river in fargo, north dakota for 16 years, building a sandbag barrier is step one in an annual flood battle -- a 24-hour pumping operation comes next.
document.title: u.s. braces for floods as red river rises
lines_and_colors: for sherri and john stern, who have lived together on the red river in fargo, north dakota for 16 years, building a sandbag barrier is step one in an annual flood battle -- a 24-hour pumping operation comes next.
